body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer support. My name is Carl Hernandez and I work for Secure Auto Inc. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Julie. To assist you better, could you please provide me with your phone number so we can reach out to you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's zero five five five - two three four - nine eight seven six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that. Lastly, could you also confirm your email address for our records?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information, Julie. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, thank you. I'm just feeling a bit sad about the security issue with my car.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Julie. Your security concern is important to us. Thank you for bringing it to our attention. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, please don't hesitate to contact us. Thank you for your time today. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Carl. Have a great day too. Goodbye.
